src_text: Ukwanda kolosulelo kweSifo seNtsholongwane i-Corona (i-COVID-19) IKhabhinethi ibonise inkxalabo emandla malunga nokunyuka kwenani losulelo olutsha lwe-COVID-19 eMpuma Koloni naseNtshona Kolon Ukunyuka kosulelo kuye kwabangelwa phakathi kwezinye izinto, kukungathotyelwa kwemigaqo-nkqubo yokuthintela i-COVID-19 kunye nemigaqo yeNqanaba loku-1 lokuLumkis IKhabhinethi iyawamkela amanyathelo acetyisiweyo ongenelelo kuMasipala oMbaxa waseNelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB) ukushukuxa ukunyuka kosulelo lwe-COVID-19.
trg_text: Increase in Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) infections Cabinet has expressed extreme concern about the spike in the number of new COVID-19 infections in the Eastern Cape and parts of the Western Cap The rise in infections has been attributed to, among other factors, non-adherence to COVID-19 prevention protocols and Alert Level 1 regulation Cabinet approved the proposed intervention measures for the Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB) Metropolitan Municipality to address increasing COVID-19 infection Cabinet also approved that the initiation schools may proceed within the strict health protocols outside of the NMB Metr The Minister of Health, Dr Zweli Mkhize, will be undertaking visits to the Western Cape to assess what needs to be done to intervene in areas such as the Garden Rout

src_text: IKhabhinethi kwakhona iyavuma ukuba izikolo zolwaluko zingaqhubeka phantsi kwemigaqo-nkqubo engqongqo yezempilo ngaphandle koMasipala oMbaxa we-NM UMphathiswa wezeMpilo, uGq Zweli Mkhize, uza kutyelela eNtshona Koloni ukuvavanya ukuba yintoni ekufuneka yenziwe ukungenelela kwiindawo ezifana ne-Garden Rout IKhabhinethi ikuphindile kwakhona ukukutsho ukubaluleka kokubambelela kungenelelo lonyango ngaphandle kwamayeza okufana nokuhlamba izandla ngamanzi nesepha okanye ukusetyenziswa kwesibulala-ntsholongwane sesandla esine-alkhoholi, ukugcina ukungasondelelani kwabantu kunye nokunxiba isigqubutheli-buso esidlangalalen Sonke kufuneka silixhase ikhwelo loMbutho weHlabathi wezeMpilo ukunqanda usulelo olutsha lwe-COVID-14.
trg_text: Cabinet reiterated the importance of adhering to non-pharmaceutical interventions such as washing hands with water and soap or using an alcohol-based hand sanitiser, maintaining social distancing and wearing a mask in publi All of us should support the call by the World Health Organisation to prevent new COVID-19 infection As we approach the festive season, we should remember that the pandemic is still active and dangerou Therefore, we must avoid unnecessary travel, particularly by public transport, and limit frequenting public venues such as restaurants, taverns or bar Each of us needs to ensure we take precautions to avoid spreading the virus to our families, especially our elder

src_text: Njengoko sisondela kwixesha leeholide zokuphela konyaka, kufuneka sikhumbule ukuba lo bhubhane usekhona kwaye uyingoz Ngoko ke, kufuneka sikulumkele ukuhamba ngaphandle kwesizathu, ingakumbi ngezithuthi zikawonke-wonke, futhi sinyenyise ukuya kwiindawo zikawonke-wonke ezifana neerestyu, iithaveni okanye iindawo ezithengisa utywal Omnye nomnye wethu kufuneka aqinisekise ukuba uthatha amanyathelo okuthintela ukusasazeka kwentsholongwane kwiintsapho zethu, ingakumbi kubantu bethu abadal Kufuneka sisoloko sigcine ukungasondelelani kwabantu ingakumbi xa sidibana siziintsapho ukubhiyozela iiholid Ngenxa yokuziphatha kwethu, sonke singanikela ekulweni kunye nasekunqandeni ukusasazeka kwe-COVID-19.
trg_text: Safer holidays As South Africans take time to enjoy the holidays with their families and friends, Cabinet encourages all of us to do so responsibl In addition to adhering to all health protocols to prevent the spread of COVID-19, we must also abide by the rules of the road to ensure that we all reach our destinations safel

src_text: IKhabhinethi kwakhona ikwamkele ukwandiswa kweMeko yeNtlekele kaZwelonke ukuya kumhla we-15 kweyoMqungu 202 Ishishini lokuthuthwa kwemithwalo IKhabhinethi ikugxeka kabukhali ukophulwa komthetho okuchaphazela ishishini lokuthuthwa kwemithwalo ezindleleni futhi ikwancoma ukusabela okukhawulezileyo ngamapolisa ekubanjweni kwabarhanelwa eGauten IKhabhinethi ithumela uvelwano olunzulu kwiintsapho kunye noogxa babaqhubi abathe balahlekelwa bubomi babo futhi ikwanqwenelela abo bonzakeleyo ukuphila okukhawuleziley Nangona sikuqonda ukukhathazeka kokwaphulwa kwemithetho yokufuduka zezinye iinkampani, ubundlobongela ayisosisombulul IKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kubo bonke abantu abachaphazelekileyo ukuba bangenise iinkxalabo zabo malunga neshishini lokuthuthwa kwemithwalo kumaziko afanelekileyo endaweni yokusebenzisa ubundlobongel UMphathiswa wezeNgqesho naBasebenzi uThulas Nxesi ukhokela iqela laBaphathiswa abajongene nalo mba futhi kulindeleke ukuba bangenise isindululo esiluqilima kwiKhabhinethi ukushukuxa zonke iimbambano ezichaphazela eli shishini Ukuphuhliswa kweziseko zophuhliso IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukunikezelwa kweNkqubo yokuBonelelwa ngaManzi amaNinzi eMshwathi KwaZulu Natali, esiza kutshintsha ngokupheleleyo ubomi bamakhaya angaphezu kwama-3 000 kwimimandla yase-Albert Falls, eMpolweni, eTrustfeed naseNad Inkqubo ingumanduleli wezinye iiprojekthi ezahlukileyo zokubonelelwa ngamanzi amaninzi kwingingqi ukuya koomasipala besithili abasixhenxe
trg_text: Cabinet also approved the extension of the National State of Disaster to 15 January 202 Freight transport industry Cabinet strongly condemned the lawlessness affecting the road freight industry and commended the swift response by the police in arresting suspects in Gauten Cabinet offered its condolences to the families and colleagues of drivers who lost their lives and wish those injured a speedy recover While we understand the frustrations at the violation of immigration laws by some companies, violence is not the solutio Cabinet calls on all affected people to submit their concerns about the freight transport industry to relevant structures instead of resorting to violenc Employment and Labour Minister Thulas Nxesi is leading a team of Ministers that is dealing with this matter and is expected to submit a concrete proposal to Cabinet to address all disputes affecting the industr 3.

src_text: eZululand, eKing Cetshwayo, e-Lembe, kuThukela, eMgungundlovu naseHarry Gwal IKhabhinethi ibongoza abaxhamli ukuba bawagcine kwaye bawasebenzise ngononophelo amanzi ukunceda onke amakhaya Iiholide ezikhuselekileyo Njengoko abemi boMzantsi Afrika bethatha ixesha ukonwabela iiholide neentsapho kunye nabahlobo babo, iKhabhinethi isikhuthaza sonke ukuba sikwenze oko ngokuthembekiley Ukongeza ekuthobeleni yonke imigaqo-nkqubo yezempilo ukunqanda ukusasazeka kwe-COVID-19, kufuneka kwakhona silandele imithetho yezendlela ukuqinisekisa ukuba sonke sifika kwiindawo zethu sikhuselekil Ukhuseleko ezindleleni luxanduva lwawo wonke ummi woMzantsi Afrika kwaye bonke abaqhubi zimoto bayabongozwa ukuba balandele umda wesantya, bangaseli baze baqhube, futhi musa ukuqhuba ngokungalawuleki nangokungakhathal
trg_text: This contributes to the Sustainable Development Goals, by recognising that the Antarctic and Southern Ocean are critical parts of the global climate syste The strategy contributes to climate action and ecological integrity by promoting the establishment of specially protected and managed area It was published in March 2020 for public commen Human Rights, Liberation and Reconciliation: Nelson Mandela Legacy Sites Nomination Dossier 1 Cabinet approved submission of the Human Rights, Liberation and Reconciliation: Nelson Mandela Legacy Sites Nomination Dossier to the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation s World Heritage Centre for consideration and inscription as a World Heritage Sit This is part of the broader Resistance and Liberation Heritage Route Projec 1 The nomination puts forward 10 individual sites in four provinces and seven municipalitie These represent our history of liberation and human rights, and provides evidence of the different phases of the struggle for freedo 1 This nomination is aligned to the National Development Plan, which emphasises the conservation and restoration of protected area It also recognises the potential of the creative economy s contribution towards generating employment and export earning Bills 1.

src_text: Abazali kunye nabakhathaleli bayabongozwa ukuba bangabashiyi bengahoywanga abantwana ngexesha leholid Ngokusebenza kunye ukukhathalelana, singaqinisekisa ixesha leholide elikhuselekileyo nelinolonwab IziGqibo zeKhabhinethi1.
trg_text: Parents and caregivers are urged not to leave children unsupervised during the holiday seaso By working together to take care, we can ensure a safe and joyous festive seaso Cabinet Decisions1.

src_text: Ingxelo yenkqubela evela kwiQela laBaphathiswa abaSebenzayo bePhondo loMntla Ntshona (i-IMTT) IKhabhinethi iyivumile ingcebiso ye-IMTT yokurhoxa kungenelelo oluthe ngqo phantsi kwecandelo 100(1)(b) eMntla Ntshona ekupheleni konyaka-mali wama-2020/22.
trg_text: P Cabinet approved the IMTT recommendation for a withdrawal of the direct interventions under section 100(1)(b) in North West by the end of the 2020/21 financial yea Cabinet is satisfied with progress that has been made on the national government s intervention in North West, although more work still needs to be done to fully restore good governance in the provinc

src_text: IKhabhinethi yanelisekile yinkqubela esele yenziwe kungenelelo lukarhulumente wesizwe eMntla Ntshona, nangona usemninzi umsebenzi ekusafuneka wenziwe ukubuyisela ngokupheleleyo ulawulo olufanelekileyo kwiphond Inkqubela yenziwe ekubuyiseleni uxolo kuluntu nasemsebenzini, ulawulo lwemali, ulawulo lweziphumo kunye nokuhanjiswa kweenkonz Kwakhona kuye kwabakho nenguqu kwiziphumo zophicotho-zincwadi, futhi nesiphelo seminyaka emithandathu yokuhla kunye nokuma ndawonye kweziphumo zophicotho-zincwad Ingxelo epheleleyo iza kuthiwa thaca ePalamente Ingxelo ngezakutshanje ngesiCwangciso sokuHlangula iShishini (i-BR Plan) leQumrhu lezoPhapho loMzantsi Afrika (i-SAA) IKhabhinethi yanikwa amagqabantshintshi ngenkqubela malunga nokuqaliswa kwesiCwangciso sokuHlangula iShishini le-SAA (i-SAA BR Plan) kunye nokuba ziza kwabiwa njani iibhiliyoni ezili-1zeerandi eziya kusetyenziswa ngokufanelekileyo ukuqinisekisa impumelelo ekuqalisweni kwesiCwangciso se-B IKhabhinethi iyayincoma inkqubela futhi iyalibongoza iSebe lezamaShishini kaRhulumente (i-DPE) ukuba likhawulezise ngokuqalisa amanyathelo angundoqo okuqinisekisa ukuqalisa kwenkampani yesizwe entsha yezophapho ehlenga-hlengisiweyo, esebenzayo nesebenza ngobuchwepheshe beteknoloj I-DPE yayalelwa ukuba igqibezele ngokuqesha ibhodi yangaphakathi ye-SAA futhi iqukumbele ukuqeshwa kweHlakani eliza kuthenga izabelo e-SA UMango wanconywa ngendima eqiqisisiweyo ayidlalileyo ngokuba ngaphantsi kwe-SAA, ukuqiniseka ubukho obukhoyo benkampani yezophapho kurhwebo IsiCwangciso (sokuLalelisela) seSizwe sokuLungela iHolide yeHlobo yowama-2020/21 IKhabhinethi isivumile isiCwangciso seSizwe sokuLungela iHolide yeHlobo yowama-2020/21 esithiwe thaca nguMphathiswa wezoLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli, uGq Nkosazana Dlamini Zum Isicwangciso silandela iingqikelelo ezibonakalise ukuba kulindeleke amathuba emvula angaphezulu kwesiqhelo kwiindawo ezininzi zelizw Oku kuthetha ukuba iingingqi ezinemvula zehlobo zigubungela onke amaphondo asibhozo
trg_text: At a continental level, the policy contributes to the Presidential Infrastructure Champion Initiative, which advances interconnectivity amongst African countries to address infrastructure deficit and boost intra-Africa trad The draft policy will be gazetted for public comment during the first quarter of 202 Ratification of the International Labour Organisation Convention Concerning the Elimination of Violence and Harassment in the World of Work Convention of 2019 (N 190) Cabinet approved the submission of the World of Work Convention of 2019 (N 190) to Parliament for ratificatio The convention addresses violence and harassment, specifically in the workplac It provides a clear framework for action and an opportunity to shape a future of work based on dignity and respect, free from violence and harassmen Ratification of this convention is aligned to the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996.

src_text: ekulindele izikhukula eziphezulu kunye nezaqhwithi zomoy Ekuqaliseni isicwangciso, amanyathelo okuthomalalisa akhona ukunciphisa ifuthe leengozi ezigqithileyo zehlob Esi sicwangciso siquka iiholide zehlobo eziqala kweyeNkanga 2020 ukuya kweyoMdumba 2021, njengoko ngeli xesha kuqhele ukwanda kweengozi ezinxulumene nemozul IKhabhinethi kwakhona iqaphele ukuba ezinye iindawo zamaphondo aseKapa zisenengxaki yembalel IKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kuluntu ukuba lwenze amalungiselelo ayimfuneko ngokuchasene neengozi zexesha lasehlotyeni futhi luqinisekise ukusabela okufanelekileyo okuza kusindisa ubomi, kukhuselwe impahla kunye neziseko zophuhliso IsiKhokelo seSizwe soPhuhliso loMgaqo-nkqubo IKhabhinethi isivumile isiKhokelo seSizwe soPhuhliso loMgaqo-nkqubo esiza kukhokela amasebe karhulumente ekuqulunqweni kwemigaqo-nkqubo yawo karhulument Esi sikhokelo sifuna ukubeka emgangathweni iinkqubo zokuqulunqwa komgaqo-nkqubo kuwo onke amanqanaba karhulument
trg_text: In implementing the plan, mitigating measures are put in place to reduce the impact of extreme summer seasonal hazard This plan incorporates the festive season starting from November 2020 to February 2021, since this period prone to increased risks of weather-related hazard Cabinet further noted that some parts of the Cape provinces are still experiencing severe drough Cabinet calls on the public to make the necessary preparations against summer seasonal hazards and ensure effective responses that would save lives, protect property and infrastructur 4.

src_text: Uxwebhu lucacisa amanyathelo ahlukeneyo ekufuneka alandelwe ekuqulunqweni komgaqo-nkqubo karhulumente, abandakanya imijikelezo yokwenza imigaqo-nkqubo, imigangatho elindelekileyo; izinto ekufuneka ziqwalaselwe xa kuqulunqwa umgaqo-nkqubo kunye namalungiselelo eziko ekufuneka abekhona ukuze kwenziwe umgaqo-nkqubo osebenzayo kunye nokuqaliswa kweenkqub Isikhokelo sangoku asikuqinisekisi ukufana kunye nentsebenziswano ekwenziweni komgaqo-nkqubo karhulument Olu xwebhu kuza kufikeleleka kulo kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe lezokuCwangcisa, ukuHlola, nokuVavanya (i-DPME) ethi: wwdpmgoza5.
trg_text: National Policy Development Framework Cabinet approved the National Policy Development Framework that will guide all government departments in drafting their respective public policie The framework seeks to standardise the policy-formulation processes across all spheres of governmen The document outlines the various steps to be followed in public policy formulation, which include policymaking cycles, expected standards; factors to be considered when formulating a policy and institutional arrangements to be put in place for effective policymaking and implementation processe

src_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo weMinikelo yoMhlaba IKhabhinethi iwuvumile umgaqo-nkqubo wokuphumeza, ojolise ekukhawuleziseni ngeminikelo yomhlaba njengenye yeendlela zokusabela kwisantya esihamba ngesantya sonwabu sohlenga-hlengiso lomhlab Ukuqaliswa komgaqo-nkqubo kuza kuyila amathuba abalulekileyo kubemi basezidolophini nabasemaphandleni ukuba bathathe inxaxheba kuqoqosh Kunika inkuthazo kwaye kukhokela iminikelo yomhlaba ngabanini bemihlaba emikhul Le nkuthazo iza noxanduva loxhobiso olumiselweyo kwinxalenye enkulu yabanini mihlaba abaza kunikela ngomhlab Umhlaba ekunikelwe ngawo kunye namanyathelo omgaqo-nkqubo wenkuthazo alungelelaniswe nesivumelwano ekwafikelelwa kuso ngamahlakani oluntu ngomnyaka wama-2016 kwi-Operations Phakisa malunga nezoLimo, uHlenga-hlengiso loMhlaba kunye noPhuhliso lwaMaphandl
trg_text: The implementation of the policy will create meaningful opportunities for citizens in peri-urban and rural areas to participate in the econom It puts in place incentives and guides land donations by owners of large tracts of lan The incentives come with prescribed empowerment responsibilities on the part of big institutional land holders that will donate lan Donated land and the incentive policy measures are aligned to the agreement reached by social partners in the 2016 Operations Phakisa on Agriculture, Land Reform and Rural Developmen The policy was released for public consultation in February 202 National Policy on Beneficiary Selection and Land Allocation of 2020 Cabinet approved the policy, which provides for a fair, credible and transparent process for beneficiary selection and land allocation in South Afric The policy incorporates comments received during its publication earlier in the year and sets out to address, amongst others, gender inequality in land ownershi

src_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo wakhutshwa ngenjongo yokubonisana noluntu ngenyanga yoMdumba 202 UMgaqo-nkqubo weSizwe malunga nokuKhethwa kwabaXhamli kunye noLwabiwo loMhlaba wowama-2020 IKhabhinethi iwuvumile umgaqo-nkqubo, obonelela ngenkqubo enobulungisa, ethembekileyo necacileyo yokukhethwa kwabaxhamli kunye nokwabiwa komhlaba eMzantsi Afrik Lo mgaqo-nkqubo udibanisa izimvo ezifunyenwe ngexesha lokupapashwa kwawo ekuqaleni konyaka futhi uzimisele ekulungiseni, phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukungalingani ngokwesini kubunini-mhlab Ubeka phambili ulwabiwo lobunini bomhlaba kumanina, ngaloo ndlela ukhuthaza ukuqhubela phambili kwamanin Ukwafuna ukujongana neemfuno zomhlaba ezahlukeneyo njengoko kubonisiwe luluntu kwimveliso yezolimo, ukuhlaliswa koluntu, umhlaba wesisa, ukuphuhliswa kwendawo yokuhlala kunye neyamashishin Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uphakamisa ukusekwa kweziko elizimeleyo ukuqhubekekisa ulwabiwo lomhlaba futhi ubonelele ngenkqubo yokufaka isicelo nge-inthanethi ukuqinisekisa ukuba luselubala ngokupheleleyo ulwabiwo lomhlab
trg_text: Preservation and Development of Agricultural Land Bill of 2020 Cabinet approved submission of the Bill to Parliamen The Bill repeals the Agricultural Land Act, 1970 (Act 70 of 1970) to give effect to constitutional requirements, and provide a fair and balanced approach in the use of agricultural lan The Bill proactively protects agricultural land for food production through the establishment of Protected Agricultural Areas in which high potential agricultural land will be delineated for agricultural purposes and low potential agricultural land will be permitted for non-agricultural use

src_text: UkuQulunqwa koMgaqo-nkqubo weZibuko elinguNtozonke (i-OSBP) IKhabhinethi iwuvumile uMgaqo-nkqubo wokuqulunqwa kwe-OSBP ukuze uluntu luwuhlolisis
trg_text: A full report will be tabled in Parliament Update on the South African Airways (SAA) Business Rescue Plan (BR Plan) Cabinet was briefed on the progress regarding the implementation of the SAA BR Plan and how the allocation of the R1billion will be effectively used to ensure the success in the implementation of the BR Pla

src_text: Ukuyilwa kwe-OSBP kufuna ukungqinelanisa ukuhamba kwabantu nokuthuthwa kweempahla phakathi kwamazibuko okungena eMzantsi Afrika kunye nakumazwe angabamelwan Izindululo kumgaqo-nkqubo zifuna ukushukuxa ukuxinana okubangela ukulibaziseka, ingakumbi kubahambi kunye nabarhwebi abanqumla amazibuk Lo mgaqo-nkqubo unika isiphumo sesiKhokelo seZibuko elinguNtozonke esamkelwa yiKhabhinethi ngowama-2018.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the draft OSBP Policy for public consultatio The creation of the OSBP seeks to harmonise the movement of people and goods between South Africa s land ports of entry and its neighbouring countrie The proposals in the policy seek to address congestion which results in delays, particularly by cross-border travellers and trader

src_text: Kwinqanaba lelizwekazi, lo mgaqo-nkqubo wenza igalelo kwiPhulo likaMongameli leziSeko zoPhuhliso, eliqhubela phambili unxibelelwano phakathi kwamazwe ase-Afrika ukusombulula intsilela yeziseko zophuhliso kunye nokunyusa urhwebo phakathi kwamazwe ase-Afrik Umgaqo-nkqubo oqulunqiweyo uza kupapashwa kwiphepha-ndaba lombuso kwikota yokuqala yowama-2021 ukwenzela ukuba uluntu luphawule Ukuqinisekiswa kweSivumelwano seNgqungquthela yaMazwe ngaMazwe yezaBasebenzi malunga nokuPheliswa koBundlobongela nokuXhatshazwa kwiiNdawo zokuSebenzela yowama-2019 (Nomb 190) IKhabhinethi isivumile isiphakamiso seNgqungquthela yeNdawo yokuSebenzela yowama-2019 (Nomb 190) esisiwe ePalamente ukwenzela ukuba siqinisekisw Le ngqungquthela ishukuxe ubundlobongela, ukuxhatshazwa, ingakumbi emsebenzin Ibonelela ngesikhokelo esicacileyo sentshukumo kunye nethuba lokwenza ikamva lomsebenzi elisekwe kwisidima nentlonipho, ngaphandle kobundlobongela kunye nokuxhatshazw Ukuqinisekiswa kwale ngqungquthela kulungelelaniswe noMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika yowe-1996.
trg_text: The Department of Employment and Labour has already developed a Code of Good Practice on the Prevention and Elimination of Violence and Harassment in the World of Work Revised Antarctic and Southern Ocean Strategy Cabinet approved the revised strategy for implementation, which includes comments received during its publication earlier in the yea The strategy provides for the coordination and implementation of the Antarctic Treaties Act, 1996 (Act 60 of 1996), relating to research, conservation, sustainable resource use and environmental management in support of the African agend

src_text: Nje ukuba kuqinisekiswe, amalungiselelo engqungquthela aza kwenziwa ekhaya futhi alungelelaniswe noMthetho woBudlelwane baBasebenzi, wowe-1995 (uMthetho wama-66 wowe-1995).
trg_text: Once ratified, the provisions of the convention will be domesticated and aligned to the Labour Relations Act, 1995 (Act 66 of 1995).

src_text: ISebe lezeNgqesho naBasebenzi sele liphuhlise iNkqubo Yokusebenza
trg_text: Cabinet appreciated the progress and implored the Department of Public Enterprises (DPE) to hasten the implementation of key initiatives to ensure the emergence of a new restructured, efficient and techno-savvy national airlin

src_text: eLungileyo kuThintelo kunye nokuPhelisa uBundlobongela kunye nokuXhatshazwa eMsebenzini IsiCwangciso-qhinga esiHlaziyiweyo se-Antarctic nakuMazantsi oLwandle IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukuqaliswa kwesicwangciso-qhinga esihlaziyiweyo, oku quka izimvo ezifunyenwe kupapasho lwawo ekuqaleni konyak Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sibonelela ngokulungelelaniswa nokumiliselwa koMthetho weziVumelwano ze-Antarctic, wowe-1996 (uMthetho wama-60 wowe-1996), onxulumene nophando, ulondolozo, ukusetyenziswa kwezixhobo ezizinzileyo kunye nolawulo lokusingqongileyo ukuxhasa inkqubo yase-Afrik
trg_text: Progress has been made in restoring community and labour peace, financial controls, consequence management and service deliver There has also been a turnaround in audit results, and an end to six years of decline and stagnation of audit finding

src_text: Oku kunegalelo kwiiNjongo zoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo, ngokuthi kuqatshelwe ukuba i-Antarctic kunye naMazantsi oLwandle ngamacandelo abalulekileyo kwinkqubo yemozulu yehlabath Esi sicwangciso-nkqubo sinegalelo kwizenzo zemozulu nakwintembeko kwindalo ngokuthi sikhuthaze ukusekwa kweendawo ezikhuselweyo nezilawulwa ngokukodw Yapapashwa kweyeKwindla 2020 ukuze uluntu luphawul
